marker.ph:
<<Window.Resources> <Style x:Key = "TxtBlock" TargetType="{x:Type TextBlock}"> <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="18"/> <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center"/> </Style>
<Style x:Key = "TxtBox" TargetType="{x:Type TextBox}"> <EventSetter Event="GotFocus" Handler="TxtBoxGotFocus"/> <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="18"/> <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center"/> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0"/> </Style> </Window.Resources> <Grid x:Name="MainGrid" Margin="0,0,0,0"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="0.5*"/> <RowDefinition Height="0.5*"/> <RowDefinition Height="0.5*"/> <RowDefinition Height="0.5*"/> <RowDefinition Height="0.5*"/> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition/> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition/> <ColumnDefinition/> <ColumnDefinition/> <ColumnDefinition/> <ColumnDefinition/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="0" Text="HEX:" Style="{StaticResource TxtBlock}"/> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="1" Text="DEC:" Style="{StaticResource TxtBlock}"/> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="2" Text="OCT:" Style="{StaticResource TxtBlock}"/> <TextBlock Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="3" Text="BIN:" Style="{StaticResource TxtBlock}"/> <TextBox Name="CustomBase" Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="4" Text="CSTM:" Style="{StaticResource TxtBox}"/>
<TextBox x:Name="HexInput" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="4" Text="0" Style="{StaticResource TxtBox}"/> <TextBox x:Name="DecInput" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="4" Text="0" Style="{StaticResource TxtBox}"/> <TextBox x:Name="OctInput" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="2" Grid.ColumnSpan="4" Text="0" Style="{StaticResource TxtBox}"/> <TextBox x:Name="BinInput" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="3" Grid.ColumnSpan="4" Text="0" Style="{StaticResource TxtBox}"/> <TextBox x:Name="CustomInput" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="4" Grid.ColumnSpan="4" Text="-" Style="{StaticResource TxtBox}"/>
<Button x:Name="Btn1" Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="5" Content="1" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="1" /> <Button x:Name="Btn2" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="5" Content="2" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="2" /> <Button x:Name="Btn3" Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="5" Content="3" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="3" /> <Button x:Name="Btn4" Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="6" Content="4" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="4" /> <Button x:Name="Btn5" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="6" Content="5" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="5" /> <Button x:Name="Btn6" Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="6" Content="6" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="6" /> <Button x:Name="Btn7" Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="7" Content="7" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="7" /> <Button x:Name="Btn8" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="7" Content="8" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="8" /> <Button x:Name="Btn9" Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="7" Content="9" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="9" /> <Button x:Name="Btn0" Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="8" Content="0" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="3" />
<Button x:Name="BtnA" Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="6" Content="A" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="A" /> <Button x:Name="BtnB" Grid.Column="4" Grid.Row="6" Content="B" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="B" /> <Button x:Name="BtnC" Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="7" Content="C" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="C" /> <Button x:Name="BtnD" Grid.Column="4" Grid.Row="7" Content="D" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="D" /> <Button x:Name="BtnE" Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="8" Content="E" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="E" /> <Button x:Name="BtnF" Grid.Column="4" Grid.Row="8" Content="F" Focusable="False" Click="BtnClick" Tag="F" />
<Button x:Name="BtnBackSpc" Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="5" Content="⌫" Focusable="False" Click="Backspace" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"/> </Grid>.../>

<<Style x:Key = "TxtBlock" TargetType="{x:Type TextBlock}"> <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="18"/> <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center"/> </Style> <Style x:Key = "TxtBox" TargetType="{x:Type TextBox}"> <EventSetter Event="GotFocus" Handler="TxtBoxGotFocus"/> <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="18"/> <Setter Property="VerticalAlignment" Value="Center"/> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0"/> </Style>.../>
